turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: four large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: two Veggie Lovers and two Meat Lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large pizzas, 2 veggie lovers and 2 meatlovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Did I tell you thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no, but i can add that to the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want thin crust for all 4?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i'll add that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Delivered is good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 50 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
